query:
UPDATE streams
    SET status        = 'ended',
        title         = COALESCE($1, title),
        end_time      = COALESCE($2, end_time),
        start_time    = COALESCE($3, start_time),
        schedule_time = COALESCE($4, schedule_time),
        like_max      = GREATEST($5, like_max),
        updated_at    = NOW()
  WHERE stream_id     = $6
